resources.string:
Hi my name is Chukwuwa Uchenna Francis. 

 I love to code, and I am a very happy person. 

I want to be able to solve all the issues of the world. 

I love watching good movies that keeps me thinking about the future of tech. 

I like playing video games also. I am a very social person 

I like food alot and I think I can cook. My biggest dream is to be able to make a whole bowl of sauce. 

I am not very good with colours so i left designing.
